member.name: T:Volo.Abp.Threading.AbpAsyncTimer
member.summary: A robust timer implementation that ensures no overlapping occurs. It waits exactly specified between ticks.

member.name: F:Volo.Abp.Threading.AbpAsyncTimer.Elapsed
member.summary: This func is raised periodically according to Period of Timer.

member.name: P:Volo.Abp.Threading.AbpAsyncTimer.RunOnStart
member.summary: Indicates whether timer raises Elapsed event on Start method of Timer for once. Default: False.

member.name: T:Volo.Abp.Threading.AbpTimer
member.summary: A robust timer implementation that ensures no overlapping occurs. It waits exactly specified between ticks.

member.name: E:Volo.Abp.Threading.AbpTimer.Elapsed
member.summary: This event is raised periodically according to Period of Timer.

member.name: P:Volo.Abp.Threading.AbpTimer.RunOnStart
member.summary: Indicates whether timer raises Elapsed event on Start method of Timer for once. Default: False.

member.name: T:Volo.Abp.Threading.IRunnable
member.summary: Interface to start/stop self threaded services.
